'] '; $str .= $query->submit('test', 'Test') .$query->end_form; $str; %] [% my ($nodename, $lastnode, $title); my ($type, $person, $fragment); $nodename = $query->param('testString'); ($nodename, $title) = split /\|/, $nodename; if ($nodename =~ /(.+)\[(.+)\]/) { $nodename = $1; my $tag = $2; if ($tag =~ /by/) { ($type, $person) = split /\w*by\w+/, $tag; } else { $type = $tag; } } $title ||= $nodename; $nodename =~ s/\s+/ /gs; my $tip = $nodename; my $isNode = 1; $nodename = $APP->rewriteCleanEscape($nodename); #add the fragment back if ($fragment) { $nodename .= '#' . $fragment; } my $str = ""; $tip = encodeHTML($tip); $title = encodeHTML($title); if (!$lastnode) { $str .= "$title"; $str; %]
